title: Reflections on @faturechi @VOCAB MALONE  discussion of the Hebrew Israelite movement
description:
Reflections on why racism is not a good foundation for identity, and why the need for good apologetics is necessary for believers.

Here is the short narrative video regarding the passages mentioned in Genesis:

https://youtu.be/MztXE2YBWmU

The longer explanation video is available here: 

https://youtu.be/Q-q7WDxci9c

The discussion between Jacob and Vocab Malone (I make a very brief appearance)

https://youtu.be/_-02pDOCpEQ

This video is a good explanation of the British Israelism movement, which was an antecedent to the Black Hebrew Israelite movement: 

https://youtu.be/HaKpI7tpryc
